Pros:
-many game modes
-good mechanics/physics
-great competitive maps
-great skins/stickers/graffitis
-great xp reward system
-great and creative operation missions
-great battle royal mode


Cons:
-toxic community
-too many cheaters
-toxic environment
-lack of constructive communication between teammates/opponents
-lack of anti-cheat software like FACEIT or ESEA
-free to play

Needed Updates
-cooldowns for toxic voice and audio messages
-one account per individual verified by with their unique ID
-anti-cheat software which is launched before the game
-small price online and offline tournaments for community players
-1v1 game mode with many maps

Total game score: 7/10
